Description: Body sherd of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior glazed black with traces of added white lines at lower break; exterior: traces of metope pattern in handle zone; glazed below with one reserved band; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 349)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 672, no. 310)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.252)
